cleaned_text: Acupuncture & Homeopathic Studio Wellness and Fitness Services San Anselmo, CA 54 followers About us Multiple Practitioners with multiple ways to help you using: Acupuncture . Homeopathy . Herbs . Cupping . Gua . Nutrition The Studio is a mother-daughter run integrative health clinic founded by Linda & Amber Scriven in Marin County. We often treat in "clusters" (pre set treatment plans) of appointments using all of our modalities to have you meet your goals and feeling your best. Enhance your ability to maintain your own health and create a balance within your body by booking an appointment today. Testimonials: (more reviews available at yelp.com and on our website at www.wellbeingacu.us make sure you trust your health care provider.) "As you walk through the doors you already feel more relaxed, comfortable and looking forward to what comes next... as you recieve the treatment everything is explained in an easy to understand way.... I definitely recommend this practice for EVERYTHING!!! They have wonderful and knowledgeable practitioners, the best prices around and all sorts of "clusters" that keep you on track for your ultimate goal. " -Katie W, San Rafael CA I have been getting acupunture treatments from the studio for quite some time now and love it!! I recently tried cupping and can't get enough of it. I leave there feeling very relaxed and pain-free. The practitioners are very compassionate and listen to what I have to say and always make me feel super comfortable. I highly recommend Acupuncture Studio." -B.C, San Rafael CA - Website - [http://www.wellbeingacu.us](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Ewellbeingacu%2Eus&urlhash=wrJ6&trk=about_website) External link for Acupuncture & Homeopathic Studio - Industries - Wellness and Fitness Services - Company size - 2-10 employees - Headquarters - San Anselmo, CA - Type - Partnership - Founded - 2010 - Specialties - Stress/ and Insomnia/ Chronic Immune Disorders / Thyroid Health Locations - Primary 22 Redhill Avenue San
